review: As a very loyal amazon customer, I bought the fire TV stick with very high hopes. Ever sense day one I have had issues with streaming video from Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon. I called amazon customer service and they told me that despite them showing my internet down speed as 11mbps, that I needed to call my ISP and that they would not replace my fire stick. Now it has started resetting itself at random times while streaming video. Best bet: get a roku

review: PROs: Very responsive UI. Remote is way better than using your phone or tablet to control.CONs: Loses network connection about once a week.  Easy enough to blame on my ISP but the chromecast plugged into the HDMI port next to it works fine during the Fire Stick's connectivity issues. Also tends to disconnect if you watch for several hours, like kids then adults watching a movie in a short span. Only way I've been able to get it to reconnect to network is to unplug it and let it cool down as it can get relatively hot to the touch.Requests: A way to pull up the screensaver and leave it up. I'm lazy and don't feel like uploading my own pics to cycle, plus yours look better.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This should be the "Guizmo" of the year.  I have been very pleased with the performance of this small devise.  It is very easy to use and comes with it's own remote.  There is more to watch on the Fire TV Stick you can ever imagine.  The picture is HD quality and the sound is loud and clear.  Amazon has outdone themselves this this small devise.  Everyone should own a Fire TV Stick.
author: Robert E. LaGrange
